headline: GTA Online
subtitle: 50% off all Penthouse Decorations in the Casino Store
content: Do your party guests keep remarking on how drab your new spot is? If so, it might be time to get new friends … and some new décor. Luckily, all Penthouse decorations are half off at the Casino Store, conveniently located in the lobby of The Diamond, so feel free to deck your halls out, perhaps with the latest and greatest works by artists like Urbanski, Dimi, Gaspar Losa, and more.
